entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:10 p.m. ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle inland near noon. Fog patches. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
